EmailTemplate.subject: Your BlueWave Account is 60 Days Past Due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.Name},
Your BlueWave account is 60 days past due.
Your outstanding account balance is {!Account.Total_Outstanding_Balance_Merge__c}.
Please make a payment as soon as possible so your account doesn't incur late fees. To check the status of your account and make a payment online, please login to your BlueWave Portal. You can also access your portal at bluewavesolar.com.
Log Into Your Portal Here
If you do not make a payment within 7 days of receiving this notice, BlueWave will terminate your agreement as soon as your utility allows us to remove you from the project at which time you will be charged the early termination fee of $1,250 for each community solar subscription.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
